name: TTS Media
tag_list: recruiting, staffing, headhunting, sales, tech, public-relations, marketing, media-headhunter, ad-sales, digital-ad-sales, digital-media-jobs, advertising-jobs, advertising-recruiter
overview:
TTS Media is a team of world-class recruiters who have extensive experience introducing elite talent in Advertising, Media, Marketing, Sales, Tech, and PR to premiere agencies and companies nationwide. For the last 30+ years TTS has been a leading search partner for the advertising, marketing, and sales communities. With both clients and candidates alike our mantra is to become a true partner so we can assist in driving your initiatives forward.

At TTS Media we provide staffing solutions for industry-leading publishers, media agencies, advertising agencies, SaaS companies, ad networks, Fortune 500’s, marketing firms, etc…

Our industry experience, market knowledge, and recruiting expertise give us the ability to simultaneously assist your hiring needs and career development.

Specialties Advertising, Ad Ops, Advertising Sales, Business Development, Marketing, Media, Public Relations, Research & Analytics, SaaS, Search Engine Marketing, Strategic Planning, Traffic, Recruiter, Headhunter, Staffing
